head.title: COVID-19 Mental Health and Social/Emotional Resources – Student, Community and Personnel Support – San Jacinto Unified School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: San Jacinto Unified School District serves grades Pre-K through 12 and is located in San Jacinto, CA.

img.h1: COVID-19 Mental Health and Social/Emotional Resources

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We want all of our SJUSD community to know that their health and safety is our priority. During times of uncertainty, it is important to concentrate on the physical and emotional health of students, staff, and families. We have created this COVID-19 resource page on our website

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: with various resources, activities and hotlines to reach out for assistance. In the event that this is an emergency, dial 9-1-1 for immediate help.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 18pt
color: indigo
color: indigo
color: indigo

td.p: Mental health support in dealing with anxiety, stress, or any other mental health challenge associated with COVID-19 pandemic, try CareSolace, our personalized mental health concierge services, available in multiple languages.
Fact Sheet on COVID-19 along with Age Appropriate Coping Strategies

p.a: The National Child Traumatic Stress Network

td.p: How to speak to kids about the Coronavirus (from the ChildMind Institute)
How to Speak to Your Children About the Coronavirus (COVID-19)
LGTBQ Youth Support During the Worldwide Pandemic (24/7)
Mental Health and Coping with COVID-19
Mental Health Peer Run Warm Line (dealing with COVID-19)

p.a: Mental Health Association of San Francisco

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 18pt

font-size: 12pt

span.span: The below resources are designed to teach age appropriate lessons and activities that focus on teaching social emotional skills such as self-awareness, self-management, responsible decision-making, social awareness and relationship skills.

span.style: color: indigo
color: indigo

tr.td: National Suicide Prevention Hotline 1-800-273-8255, or text Hello To 741741

td.div: Crisis Intervention and Suicide Prevention/Riverside County
24 hours a day/7 days a week/365 days a year. Specially trained counselors, accredited by the American Association of Suicidiology (AAS).
24 hrs. a day/7 days a week/WA Recovery Help Line
24 hrs. a day/7 days a week/Teen Link
Anonymous/confidential, 155 languages, emotional crisis, anxiety, loneliness, family relationships/difficulties, symptoms of mental illness and loss of job

Counseling Service, healing after a sexual assault. Teen Survivors: All young people, of all genders and sexual identities, ages 12 and older, Free confidential counseling, medical accompaniment, RARCC;s goal is to help you regain control of your life and feel empowered to make decisions about what you want to do.

24 hours a day/7 days a week/ Professional Crisis Counselors. Assistance in over 200 languages. Mandated Reporter Resource, crisis intervention information, literature referrals to emergency Social Service
24 hours a day/7 days a week. Confidential Hotline, 12-14 year old in crisis. Crisis/Suicide/Runaway/Harming others/Prevention
Mental Health Support, 24/7 to support families, students and staff in need and will ensure all have access to reliable, ethical and high quality care, regardless of circumstances.
For individuals and family members facing mental health and/or substance abuse disorders.
Crisis Intervention Support for teens in unhealthy relationships.
National Suicide & Veterans Crisis Prevention Lifeline
California Coalition for youth offers support, encouragement and referrals to youth needing assistance
Suicide Prevention Hotline for Gay or Questioning Youth.
C.A.S.A. offers free and confidential support with a professional counselor to all survivors
of sexual violence, domestic violence, child abuse, human trafficking, individual
counseling, peer to peer counseling, survivor support group, accompaniment services,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 18pt

td.div: Red Nacional de Prevencion del Suicidio
Intervencion de crisis y Prevencion del Suicidio / Condado de Riverside
24 horas al dia/7 dias a la semana/365 dias al ano. Consejeros especificamente entrenados, acreditado por el American Association of Suicidiology (AAS).
24 horas al dia/7 dias a la semana/WA Linea de Ayuda de Recuperacion
24 horas al dias/7 dias a la semana/Eclace de Jovenes
Anonimo/confidencial, 155 lenguajes, crisis emocional, ansiedad, soledad, relaciones de familia/dificultades, sintomas de enfermedad mental y perdida de trabajo
Centro de crisis de Abuso Sexual Zona de Riverside

Servicio de consejeria, sanacion despues de abuso sexual. Jovenes sobrevivientes: Todo joven, todo genero y identidades sexuales, edades 12 y mayor, Gratis consejeria confidencial, acompanamiento medico, RARCC;s le meta es ayudar a recuperar su vida y sentirse facultado a tomar las deciciones que necesite.
Linea directa de Abuso Infantil /Child Help USA/National

24 horas al dia/7 dias a la semana/ Consejeros de Crisis Profesionales. Asistencia en mas de 200 lenguajes. Reporte de Bajo mandato recurso, informacion de crisis y intervencion, referencias de literatura de emergencia para Servicio Social
24 horas al dia/7 dias a la semana. Linea directa confidencial, de 12-14 edades en crisis. Crisis/Suicidio/Ninos escapados de su casa/Danar a otros/Prevencion
Apoyo de Salud Mental, 24/7 apoyo para familias, estudiantes y personal en necesidad y asegurar que todos tengan acceso de confianza, etical de alta calidad y cuidado, a pesar de las circumstancias.
Abuso de Sustancias y Salud Mental
Para individuales y familias enfrentando problemas de salud mental y/o abuso de sustancias y trastornos
Intervencion de crisis y apoyo para los jovenes en relaciones poco saludables
Ninos escapados de su casa Nacional
Suicidio Nacional & Linea de Vida para Veteranos en Crisis y Prevencion
Linea directa de Jovenes en Crisis
La Coalicion de California para jovenes ofrece apoyo, animo y referencia para jovenes necesitando asistencia.
Linea Directa y Prevencion de Suicidio para Homosexual o Interrogatorio Juvenil.
Embarazo, Infancia & Perdida de ninos-1-800-944-4773 O Texto HELLO al 741741
Trastornos del la Alimentacion-1-800-931-2237. O TEXT NEDA al 741741
